title: Biofabrication with microbial cellulose: from bioadaptive designs to living materials
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,7363-7391
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00641G, Review Article
Yi Lu, Marina Mehling, Siqi Huan, Long Bai, Orlando J. Rojas
This review provides comprehensive guidance on available 3D biofabrication methods, featuring solid-/soft-templating strategies, and discusses relevant opportunities for sustainable design and development.
